name: Ultra Trail Races
content:
Description: Data on the over 1000 ultra trail races globally.

Source: [Tidy Tuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2021/2021-10-26/readme.md)

Columns:

* event (string): Name of the event
* race (string): Name of the specific race
* city (string): Name of the city where the race happens
* country (string): Name of the country where the race happens
* distance (numerical): Total distance of the race in kilometers(km)
* elevation_gain (numerical): Total elevation gain in meters(m)
* elevation_loss (numerical): Total elevation loss in meters(m)
* aid_stations (numerical): Count of aid stations for the entire race
